text:
And about that time, Judah went down from among his brothers.
And he pitched near an Adullamite man, and his name was Hirah.

And Judah saw there the daughter of a Canaanite man, and his name was Shua.
And he took her and he went into her.

And she conceived and she gave birth to a son.
And he called his name Er.

And she conceived again and she gave birth to a son.
And he called his name Onan.

And she increased again, and she gave birth to a son.
And he called his name Shelah.
And he was in Keziv when she bore him.

And Judah took a wife for Er, his firstborn.
And her name was Tamar.

And it came about that Er, the firstborn of Judah
Did evil in the eyes of YHWH
So YHWH killed him.

And Judah said to Onan, “Go into the wife of your brother
And perform the duty of a brother in law to her
And raise up a seed for your brother.”

But Onan knew that the seed would not belong to him
And when he went into the wife of his brother 
That he would spoil it to the ground
Therefore he would not give seed to his brother

And it was evil in the eyes of YHWH the thing which he did
So he killed him also.

And Judah said to Tamar, his daughter-in-law,
“Dwell as a widow in the house of your father
Until Shelah, my son, grows up.”
For he said, “Lest he should die also like his brothers
And Tamar went and she dwelt in the house of her father.”
